note.p: Education: Mr Burnet's School at Utoxeter, Staffordshire; Trinity College, Cambridge; BA (1717), MA (1720); Incorporated at Oxford (1723); DD (Com Reg 1728)
Career: Ordained deacon (1718), priest (1724); Fellow of Trinity (1719); Rector of St George's Bloomsbury, Middlesex (1731-1761); Rector of Orwell, Cambridgeshire (1748-1761)
Notes: GM gives date of death as 22 March 1761, London Magazine gives 26 March 1761
